title: Hanging, "Earth", late 1920s–early 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk. 
Technique: wax resist (batik) on plain weave with 'crepe' effect achieved by tight spinning of the yarn. Starting with a white foundation, a sequential application of resists in 2 blues, green, lined with aqua woven silk (plain weave plus 2
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Lydia Bush-Brown Head
description: Landscape with conical island mountains. In front, hill with animals and small trees. Greens, white and blues with some yellow and salmon. Border of inbricated fans.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Earth", late 1920s–early 1930s.
late 1920s–early 1930s. Medium: silk. 
Technique: wax resist (batik) on plain weave with 'crepe' effect achieved by tight spinning of the yarn. Starting with a white foundation, a sequential application of resists in 2 blues, green, lined with aqua woven silk (plain weave plus 2. Gift of the Estate of Lydia Bush-Brown Head. 1985-2-2.
